fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Transform a player into a wild beast to kill another player on every even-numbered night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Transforming a player into a wild beast will force them to deal a Basic attack to your other target. This will replace the action of the player you transform into a beast (i.e. roleblocking bypassing immunities). The player you transform will be given a notification that they were transformed.
- With the Necronomicon, you may transform a player every night. The transformation notification is also removed.
- You may not transform other Coven members, but you may transform yourself (this will not roleblock you).
